Agenda for ATPESC 2018

Extreme Agenda

Start Minutes Topic Speaker
7:30am 60 Breakfast  
8:30am 5 Introduction to Session Ulrike Meier Yang (LLNL)
8:35am 55 Algorithmic Adaptations to Extreme-Scale Computing (YouTube) David Keyes (KAUST)
9:30am 60 Overview of Numerical Algorithms and Software (YouTube) Lori Diachin (LLNL)
+ Hands-on Example (YouTube)
10:30am 30 Break  
11:00am 60 Unstructured Meshing and Discretization (YouTube) Tzanio Kolev (LLNL) &
Mark Shephard (RPI)
+ Hands-on examples with MFEM
12:30pm 60 Lunch  
1:30pm 45 Time Integration and Nonlinear Solvers (YouTube) Barry Smith (ANL)
+ Hands-on examples with PETSc
2:15pm 45 Krylov Solvers and Multigrid (YouTube) Ulrike Meier Yang (LLNL)
+ Hands-on examples with HYPRE
3:00pm 30 Break  
3:30pm 45 Direct Linear Solvers (YouTube) Xiaoye Li (LBNL)
+ Hands-on examples with SuperLU
4:15pm 45 Numerical Optimization (YouTube) Todd Munson &
Hong Zhang (ANL)
+ Hands-on examples with TAO
5:00pm 30 Putting It All Together: (YouTube)
One Perspective		 Mark Shephard &
Cameron Smith (RPI)
5:30pm 60 Dinner + Panel: Extreme-Scale Algorithms &
Software (YouTube)		 Moderator Mark Miller (LLNL)
Panelists:
Xiaoye Li (LBNL)
Tzanio Kolev (LLNL)
Ulrike Meier Yang (LLNL)
Todd Munson (ANL)
6:30pm 180 Evening Hands-on + Other Activities All
9:30pm Adjourn
